title: Chinese firms expect limited impact from Ukraine crisis; some seek to benefit
description: A growing number of Chinese firms with business in Ukraine or Russia say the impact from the region's crisis is limited for now, as some sought to reassure investors, with the scale of Chinese investment in the region limited and dominated by state firms.
content: SHANGHAI, Feb 25 (Reuters) - A growing number of Chinese firms with business in Ukraine or Russia say the impact from the region's crisis is limited for now, as some sought to reassure investors, witâ€¦ [+2561 chars]
